SEARCH
模块 com.teamsolid.javaproject
程序包 com.teamsolid.javaproject

类 Player

java.lang.Object
com.teamsolid.javaproject.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game. This class handles the player's position on the game board, movements, interactions with obstacles, and the number of throws made.
作者:
Jingzhi_Zhou

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Player()
    Constructs a new Player with initial settings.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Player

      public Player()
      Constructs a new Player with initial settings. The player starts at position [0, 0] with a distance of 1.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getPosition

      public int[] getPosition()
      Retrieves the current position of the player.
      返回:
      The current position of the player as an array [x, y].

    • isStoppedBySpike

      public boolean isStoppedBySpike()
      Checks if the player is stopped by a spike.
      返回:
      true if the player is stopped by a spike, false otherwise.

    • setStoppedBySpike

      public void setStoppedBySpike(boolean stopped)
      Sets the player's stopped status.
      参数:
      stopped - Indicates whether the player is stopped by a spike.

    • move

      public void move(int steps)
      Moves the player a certain number of steps on the board. The method calculates the new position based on the steps and updates the player's position.
      参数:
      steps - The number of steps to move the player.

    • teleportToRandomLocation

      public void teleportToRandomLocation()
      Teleports the player to a random location on the board. This method is typically called when a player encounters a teleporting obstacle.

    • reborn

      public void reborn()
      Resets the player's position to the starting point. This method is typically called when a player encounters a fire obstacle.

    • incrementThrowCount

      public void incrementThrowCount()
      Increments the throw count of the player. This method is called each time the player makes a throw in the game.

    • getThrowCount

      public int getThrowCount()
      Retrieves the total number of throws made by the player.
      返回:
      The total number of throws made by the player.

    • calculateDistance

      public int calculateDistance(int x, int y)
      Calculates the distance based on the player's position on the board. This method is used to determine the player's progress in the game.
      参数:
      x - The X-coordinate of the player's position.
      y - The Y-coordinate of the player's position.
      返回:
      The calculated distance based on the player's position.
